content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that the apartment is in a great location and well-maintained. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's too low for my liking. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that it's lower than your expectation. However, I am willing to pay 450 euros per month. It's a fair price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I disagree. I think the apartment is worth more than that. I'm looking for a price around 500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I have found similar apartments in the area with lower prices. I am willing to pay 480 euros per month, which is a reasonable price for this area.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think your offer is too low. I believe the apartment is worth more than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I will offer 490 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [490] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great! We have an agreement. The rental price is 490 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
